items.title: After a far-right lawmaker stormed my class, the people of my city showed another way
items.summary: When state institutions act in violation of fundamental values, disobedience is not only a civil right but a duty. When lectures by journalists and protest leaders are canceled out of fear, we will demonstrate there is another way

items.title: 'We worry more about food' say Venezuelans living under threat of US military action

'Israel's enemies are celebrating,' ex-PM B

items.title: We used to conceal Jewish symbols. Now it's Hebrew we're asked to hide
items.summary: Who would dare read a Hebrew book today on the subway in Rome, London or Paris?

items.title: Singapore sanctions four far-right Israeli activists over violence against Palestinians
items.summary: Singapore is the latest country to sanction far-right Israeli settler activists amid the surge in West Bank violence.
